meanings.definition: The act of doing evil or harm.
meanings.sent2: The detective uncovered evidence of evildoing in the town.
meanings.sent3: The cartoon villain's evildoing always backfires on him.
meanings.sent4: The shadow of evildoing loomed over the peaceful village.
meanings.sent5: The consequences of evildoing can be devastating.

meanings.sent1: The community was shocked by the evildoing of their trusted leader.
meanings.sent2: She was determined to put an end to the evildoing in the city.
meanings.sent3: The comedy show exaggerated the evildoing of the clumsy character for laughs.
meanings.sent4: The tale warned of the dangers of succumbing to evildoing.
meanings.sent5: The painting depicted the battle between good and evildoing.
